localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
blogPost.body: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
blogPost.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: 通过在线自动翻译您的视频，让全球观众都能看到您的视频。通过创建多种语言的内容，扩大您的影响力，让全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自动将您的视频翻译成不同的语言在线

localize.description: 通過在線自動翻譯您的視頻，讓全球觀衆都能看到您的視頻。通過創建多種語言的內容，擴大您的影響力，讓全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自動將您的視頻翻譯成不同的語言在線

previous.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
previous.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes

localize.description: Paragon Connect允许开发人员在几分钟内将面向用户的SaaS集成嵌入到他们的产品中。只需设置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即将您的产品与Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS应用集成。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。

localize.description: Paragon Connect允許開發人員在幾分鐘內將面向用戶的SaaS集成嵌入到他們的產品中。只需設置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即將您的產品與Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS應用集成。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。

next.excerpt: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
next.title: Thunder Client - Rest API client for VS Code, lightweight Postman alternative

localize.description: 雷霆客户端是Visual Studio代码的Rest API客户端扩展，设计简洁明了。该扩展通过基于脚本的GUI测试使api测试变得非常容易。
localize.tagline: VS Code的Rest API客户端，轻量级的Postman替代方案。

localize.description: 雷霆客戶端是Visual Studio代碼的Rest API客戶端擴展，設計簡潔明瞭。該擴展通過基於腳本的GUI測試使api測試變得非常容易。
localize.tagline: VS Code的Rest API客戶端，輕量級的Postman替代方案。
